name: Monster Apocalypse (yaredmo) (yaredmo) (yaredmo)
description:
This is my Shooter game project. There are at least three significant modifications to the game.

1. Created a complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.   

2. Modified the out-of-game menus in some significant and meaningful way.

3. Reskinned the existing graphics in some significant way, such as change the player or an enemy to a completely different character.

Additionally

4. Added new obstacles and challenges.

5. Additional significant and coherent graphical elements to the game, such as new enemies or environmental challenges.

6. Added new tracks to the game.

7. Added more gunfire spreads as levels increase. 

8. Added a Splash screen with a custom-made logo.

Created by:
 Yared Moges
